name: Lemna minor
Relationship: Compare: DULC. (damp surroundings and foggy weather). CALC.; TEUCR.; CALEN.; NAT-SULPH.

Mouth: PUTRID TASTE on rising in the morning
Nose: Crusts and mucopurulent discharge very abundant
Pain like a string from nostrils to ear
Reduces nasal obstruction when it is an edematous condition

details: A catarrhal remedy. Acts especially upon the nostrils. NASAL POLYPI; SWOLLEN TURBINATES. ATROPHIC RHINITIS. Asthma from nasal obstruction; worse in wet weather.
